mapper.select: SELECT categoryName, brandName, price FROM ( SELECT c.name as categoryName, b.name as brandName, p.name as productName, p.price, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY c.id ORDER BY p.price, b.name ASC) as rn FROM product p JOIN category c ON p.category_id = c.id JOIN brand b ON p.brand_id = b.id ) ranked_products WHERE rn = 1

SELECT b.name as brand_name, c.name as category_name, p.price FROM product p JOIN brand b ON p.brand_id = b.id JOIN category c ON p.category_id = c.id WHERE b.id = ( SELECT brand_id FROM product GROUP BY brand_id ORDER BY SUM(price) ASC LIMIT 1 ) ORDER BY c.name;
